items.name: Accomplice's Gloves

Each round: Equip 2 random Support items.

+AR & MR
Back Rows
Bouns AP & Mana

can crit and

items.name: Eternal Monarch's Crown
items.desc:
After dealing damage 12 times, gain % Damage Amp for the rest of combat.

After dealing damage 25 times, gain 20% maximum Health, 30% Omnivamp, and 50% damage amp.

Only Faeries can hold this item.
Bench the champion to remove it.
items.fromDesc:
+30% Attack Damage
+30 Ability Power
+25% Attack Speed

items.name: Queenguard's Armor
items.desc:
Gain 20% increased healing and shielding. Heal for 5% of the Queen's damage dealt.

Only Faeries can hold this item.
Bench the champion to remove it.

items.name: Armor of Eternal Flight
items.desc:
Gain 50% increased healing and shielding. Heal for 20% of the Queen's damage dealt.

Only Faeries can hold this item.
Bench the champion to remove it.

items.name: Sentinel Swarm
items.desc: Every 3 seconds, summon a powerful Sentinel equipped with Completed, Artifact, and Radiant items.

items.name: Frying Pan
items.desc: ...why else would it be here?

items.name: Tactician's Cape
items.desc:
Your team gains +1 max team size.

10% chance to drop 1 gold after 10 seconds of combat.

"...and a bit of Luck."

items.name: Tactician's Shield
items.desc:
Your team gains +1 max team size.

10% chance to drop 1 gold when the holder dies.

"Imbued with a Philosopher's wisdom..."

items.name: Mistral
items.desc:
Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 8 seconds.
Your team gains 15% Attack Speed.

[Ignores crowd control immunity.]
[Unique - only 1 per champion]

items.name: Locket of the Silver Lunari
items.desc: Combat start: The holder and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain 60 bonus Armor and Magic Resist, but gain 5 less Mana per attack.

items.name: Chalice of Malice
items.desc: Combat start: Grant 60 Ability Power to allies within 1 hex in the same row. The holder loses 20 Ability Power instead of gaining any.

items.name: Dark Shroud of Stillness
items.desc:
Combat start: Shoot a beam straight ahead and behind that 65% Mana Reaves enemies and other allies.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Mana Reave: increase maximum Mana until the next cast

items.name: Turbulent Zephyr
items.desc:
Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 10 seconds. Once the enemy returns to combat, they gain 30 bonus attack damage and 30 ability power for the rest of combat.

[Ignores CC immunity]
[Unique - only 1 per champion]
